title: New Zealand Disconnecting Issues
body:
This would have happened around the 9:30am - 9:50am time period on the 1/6/2017 (Thursday) Where everyone playing from New Zealand would have spontaneously disconnected.

I ask this because I was playing a game at that time and 3 people disconnected from my game, and all were from NZ (2 on my team 1 on the enemy team).
2 of my housemates were also in separate games and had the same issue with 1 or 2 people disconnecting from their games and also happened to be from NZ. If this issue is brought to the devs attention there **may** be some sort of recognition to the NZ people being in those game and leaverbuster/ auto suspensions being revoked? (although it really depends on community response)

But only if enough people come forward about the issue.
